description.narrative: The Project Development Objectives (PDO) are to: (i) improve the quality of water and wastewater services in the Durres Water Utility Service Area; and(ii) improve the financial performance of Durres Water Utility.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Article IV, 4.01 LA | Description :Borrower shall prepare and adopt Project Operations Manual satisfactory tothe Bank as a condition of effectiveness | Due Date :14-Mar-2014

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, C.1. LA | Description :The Borrower, through MTI, shall no later than April 30, 2014,establish a Project Committee, with a composition, terms of reference, and resources satisfactory to the Bank. | Due Date:30-Apr-2014

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, E.1 LA | Description :A Project Implementation Agreement, satisfactory to the Bank, hasbeen duly executed between DWU and MTI by April 2014, but no later before start of implementation of Component 3 (c). | Due Date:30-Apr-2014

title.narrative: Length of sewerage network rehabilitated or constructed
New household sewer connections constructed under the project
Length of bulk water pipeline constructed
Length of water supply network rehabilitated
Households with individual metered connection in the Durres Service Area
Duration of water supplied to households in project affected areas
Piped household water connections that are benefiting from rehabilitation works undertaken by the project
Additional annual volume of wastewater that is appropriately collected, treated and disposed
Beneficiaries from improved wastewater collection and transportation facilities
Total Annual Billed Volume by DWU
